titles.title: A resolution honoring the 80th birthday of James L. Buckley, former United States Senator for the state of New York.
A resolution honoring the 80th birthday of James L. Buckley, former United States Senator for the state of New York.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on March 13, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Congratulates James Buckley (former U.S. Senator from New York) on the celebration of his 80th birthday and honors his contributions during his distinguished Government career.
